scripts.build: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg swc_ast_unknown' cargo build --release -p swc_plugin_transform_imports --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/release/swc_plugin_transform_imports.wasm .
scripts.build:debug: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg swc_ast_unknown' cargo build -p swc_plugin_transform_imports --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/debug/swc_plugin_transform_imports.wasm .
